mapper.select: SELECT cart_id FROM cart WHERE goods_id = #{goods_id} AND email = #{email} ORDER BY cart_id

SELECT c.cart_id AS cart_id, g.goods_id AS goods_id, g.goods_name AS goods_name, g.goods_thumbnail AS goods_thumbnail, g.goods_price AS goods_price, c.cart_cnt AS cart_cnt, (goods_price * cart_cnt) total_price FROM cart c INNER JOIN goods g ON c.goods_id = g.goods_id WHERE c.email = #{memEmail} ORDER BY c.cart_id
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cart_cnt = #{cart_cnt} WHERE cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_ORDER(order_id, email, order_date, order_total_price, delivery_price, recipient, order_phone, order_zip_code, order_addr, order_addr_detail, order_memo, order_pay, order_status, delivery_code, order_email, order_amount) VALUES(#{partner_order_id}, #{email}, SYSDATE, #{total_amount}, 2500, #{orderName}, #{orderCellPhone}, #{orderZipcode}, #{orderAddress}, #{orderAddressSub} ,#{order_memo}, #{order_pay}, '결제완료', 1, #{partner_user_id}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT go.order_id, go.order_status, go.order_date, go.order_amount, g.goods_thumbnail, g.goods_name, od.goods_id, od.goods_count, od.total_price FROM order_detail od LEFT JOIN goods g on od.goods_id = g.goods_id LEFT JOIN goods_order go on od.order_id = go.order_id WHERE go.email = #{email} ORDER BY order_id DESC
SELECT order_status, count(order_id) AS count FROM goods_order WHERE order_email = #{memEmail} GROUP BY order_status
